@Peter_1994, When you go into manual activation, it'll show you your "Hardware ID."  You need to copy and paste that into the Keygen and then hit generate.  It'll then give you the "Activation Key" to copy and paste back into the game's manual activation.

*INSTALLATION FOR DUMMIES, that includes me:-)

1. Drop the download into Power ISO.
2. Double click on the image and let it self extract.
3. Create a folder on desktop eg Avatar.
4. Copy and paste the file from Power ISO into   
    your new folder.
5. Open your new folder double click on autorun.
6. Select your language and install.
7. When this process is finished you now have  Avatar installed in Program files.
8. Drop the Crack folder (from your desktop Avatar folder) into C/Program Files/Ubisoft/Avatar in program files.
9. Now run Avatar (cliclk on Avatar not Avatar launcher.)
10. An activation assistant will open, copy the Hardware ID number. Don't close.
11. Open the crack folder and run the keygen, paste in the Hardware ID and click Generate. You will now see the Activation code.
12. Finished and ready to play, create a desktop short cut by right clicking on Avatar, select short cut, drag to desktop, done.

*Buy the game if you like it and delete the orginal Torrent download.
